How it works?

1. You need to attach the EasySwipeControlsSystem.cs to the GameObject Player or Main Camera.
2. Then attach the EasySwipeControlsSystem.cs script to the GameObject.
3. You need to write the necessary actions, functions, scripts in Void's script - EasySwipeControlsSystem.cs.
4. Enjoy!


For debug on PC use "Arrows" for Swipes and "Space" for Tap.

For example, I created a Demo Scene in which the text changes depending on the actions of the user\player.


Easy Swipe Controls System - is a simple creation and management of Swipes and Taps on mobile devices (Android, iOS etc.). 
You can quickly and easily control the actions, scripts and other. 

Features: 

• Support all Swipes: Left, Right, Up, Down. 

• Support Tap's. 

• Very Easy and fast solution. 

• Example scene. 

• Debug mode uses keyboard on PC. 

• All code is comment. 

All it - Easy Swipe Controls System.
